comments:
When I attempt to run any JUnit Plug-in Tests, the launch attempt fails 
almoste immediately. The text at the end of this description is written to the 
Console. To verify this problem, I created a vanilla JUnit testcase and 
attempted to run it. Here is the complete text of the JUnit testcase:

------------- begin test case text ------------------------
package example;

import junit.framework.TestCase;

import org.eclipse.core.resources.IWorkspaceRoot;
import org.eclipse.core.resources.ResourcesPlugin;

public class ResourceTest extends TestCase {

	public ResourceTest(String name) {
		super(name);
	}

	public void testResources() throws Exception {
		IWorkspaceRoot root = ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace().getRoot();
		assertNotNull("should be able to obtain the workspace root", 
root);
	}
}
----------- end test case text -------------------------


------ Console output follows ----------------------
